Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-33394 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 1.5.0-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-33394 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 1.5.0-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package kubevirt is earlier than 1.5.0-2, affected by CVE-2024-33394
